org.daisy.streamline.engine

Class TaskRunnerCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.streamline.engine.TaskRunnerCore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class TaskRunnerCore
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Closeable
    Provides a utility for running a single task at a time.

    • Constructor Summary

      void close() 
      java.util.List<RunnerResult> runTask(org.daisy.streamline.api.tasks.InternalTask task)

        public TaskRunnerCore(java.io.File input,
                      java.io.File output)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new task runner core with the specified options. Consider using TaskRunnerCore(AnnotatedFile, File) instead, as it provides the task with more details.
        Parameters:
        input - the input file
        output - the final output file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • TaskRunnerCore

        public TaskRunnerCore(java.io.File input,
                      java.io.File output,
                      TempFileWriter tfw)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new task runner core with the specified options. Consider using TaskRunnerCore(AnnotatedFile, File, TempFileWriter) instead, as it provides the task with more details.
        Parameters:
        input - the input file
        output - the final output file
        tfw - a temporary file writer for writing debug copies of intermediary files
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs

    • Method Detail

      • runTask

        public java.util.List<RunnerResult> runTask(org.daisy.streamline.api.tasks.InternalTask task)
                                     throws org.daisy.streamline.api.tasks.InternalTaskException,
                                            java.io.IOException
        Runs a single tasks or task bundle (if the task is expanding) and returns the results. If a temporary file handler has been assigned, copies of the intermediary results are also created.
        Parameters:
        task - the task to run
        Returns:
        returns a list of runner results
        Throws:
        org.daisy.streamline.api.tasks.InternalTaskException - if there is a problem with a task
        java.io.IOException - if an I/O error occurs
